law.catch_line: Unlawful transaction with minor in the third degree.

text.section: Unlawful transaction with a minor in the third degree is a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 382, sec. 21, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 219, sec. 11, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 263, effective January 1, 1975.
